subject: Science
title: Protons, Neutrons, and Electrons
description: A quick win: understand Protons, Neutrons, and Electrons.

hook.text: Three particles build every atom in the universe. Just three.

buildup.text: Protons carry positive charge. Electrons carry negative charge. Neutrons have no charge.

discovery.text: The number of protons defines the element: 1 proton is hydrogen, 6 is carbon, 79 is gold.

twist.text: Change one proton and you change the entire element. Add one to lead and you get bismuth.

climax.text: Electrons determine chemistry. Protons determine identity. Neutrons determine stability.

punchline.text: Everything from air to gold is built from three particles arranged differently.

quiz.question: What determines which element an atom is?
